Rinka

Height:

Introduction

Aratake Rinka (Korean: 아라타케 린카; Japanese: 荒武 凛香) is a Japanese influencer under Avex Management.

She is best known for being a contestant on the 2021 South Korean survival show "Girls Planet 999" and the 2024 Thai-Chinese survival show "Chuang Asia Thailand".
